abstract: Farhad Manjoo State of the Art column discusses plan proposed by technologists and economists known as universal basic income, under which every adult would get check for basic living expenses to make up for jobs lost to artificial intelligence; notes plan addresses future in which robots would do majority of labor and professional work.

headline.print_headline: A Plan in Case Robots Take the Jobs: Give Everyone a Basic Income
headline.main: A Plan in Case Robots Take the Jobs: Give Everyone a Paycheck

snippet: For some technologists, machine intelligence is not seen as a job-killing catastrophe, but something like a windfall that could lead to universal basic income.
lead_paragraph: For some technologists, machine intelligence is not seen as a job-killing catastrophe, but something like a windfall that could lead to universal basic income.
